generatedTitle: Types of Wind Turbines and Their Variations

extractFactDictList.question: What do wind turbines harness?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Wind turbines are powerful devices that harness wind energy and convert it into electricity.

extractFactDictList.question: What role do wind turbines play in renewable energy production?
extractFactDictList.sentence: They play a significant role in the production of renewable energy, reducing carbon emissions and dependence on fossil fuels.
extractFactDictList.phrase: Reducing carbon emissions and dependence on fossil fuels

extractFactDictList.question: How many main types of wind turbines are explored in the article?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In this article, we will explore the three main types of wind turbines: horizontal-axis wind turbines (HAWTs), vertical-axis wind turbines (VAWTs), and offshore wind turbines.
